ygData.subject: Baking === was Imbrued gloves?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Haha yes Shada, gnome kabobs!  And I have the skewers to make some.  Next time I am in Sol A I will whip some up for you.  On the other hand, those
ygData.messageBody:
> can you make anything out of gnomes?!?! if so, i gotta have some to give to
> all my fellow Powa clan. to eat Keplegrob gnomes would just be heaven.
>
> Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L45 High Elf Wizard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
> > Plus I am a master baker now. Try that with natural half-elf
> > smarts LOL.
> >

Haha yes Shada, gnome kabobs! And I have the skewers to make some. Next time I am
in Sol A I will whip some up for you. On the other hand, those Keplegrobs can be
mean I hear; I might need Supa to protect me.

And Shada, did you say 5 horns in your guild not being used? Any chance....?

Maravana Vireo
50th bard of Jus Divinum
Mithaniel Marr
